entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -18.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chibougamau Chapais Airport 9:57 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -18.2°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -20.6°C
Wind: NW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
